member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource.EventSourceLoggerProvider
member.summary: The provider for the EventSource logger.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource.EventSourceLoggerProvider.CreateLogger(System.String)
member.param: The category name for messages produced by the logger.
member.returns: The instance of that was created.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource.EventSourceLoggerProvider.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource.LoggingEventSource
member.summary: The LoggingEventSource is the bridge from all ILogger based logging to EventSource/EventListener logging.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource.LoggingEventSource.Keywords
member.summary: This is public from an EventSource consumer point of view, but since these defintions are not needed outside this class.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource.LoggingEventSource.Keywords.FormattedMessage
member.summary: Turns on the 'FormatMessage' event when ILogger.Log() is called. It gives the formatted string version of the information.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource.LoggingEventSource.Keywords.JsonMessage
member.summary: Turns on the 'MessageJson' event when ILogger.Log() is called. It gives JSON representation of the Arguments.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource.LoggingEventSource.Keywords.Message
member.summary: Turns on the 'Message' event when ILogger.Log() is called. It gives the information in a programmatic (not formatted) way.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource.LoggingEventSource.Keywords.Meta
member.summary: Meta events are events about the LoggingEventSource itself (that is they did not come from ILogger.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSourceLoggerFactoryExtensions.AddEventSourceLogger(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory)
member.summary: Adds an event logger that is enabled for .Information or higher.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSourceLoggerFactoryExtensions.AddEventSourceLogger(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder)
member.summary: Adds an event logger named 'EventSource' to the factory.
member.returns: The so that additional calls can be chained.
